metadata.title: RZ/G3S: Which CM33 cores can be operated in the AWO mode?

sections.content:
Question:
Which CM33 cores can be operated in the AWO mode?
Answer:
In the AWO mode, the CM33 cores without an FPU can be used. 
The CA55 cores and the CM33 cores with an FPU can be used only when in the ALL_ON mode.
Suitable Products
RZ/G3S
